item.title: General
item.description: This details the general usage of the CardFunc API.

item.title: Card Payments for PSP:s
item.description: CardFunc provides easy to integrate solutions for Payment System Providers to offer credit card payments with minimal PCI and compliance work needed.

item.title: Authorization
item.description: The authorization endpoint is used for creating and listing authorizations.

item.title: CardFunc UI
item.description: To provide a user interface for an end-user to enter sensitive card information the CardFunc Element is used. Usage CardFunc Element is a webbased technology. In the context on native apps the element should be placed on a webpage that is viewed inside a web view. Embedding CardFunc Element is delivered as a web component. To use it start by including the necessary script file in your html header:

item.title: Developer Focus
item.description: We put programmers first. That is why all your integration questions are answered by our developers directly. No first line support staff to try to get past.

item.title: Be Productive
item.description: Easy to integrate API:s make you more productive so you can focus on creating your innovation.

item.title: Cloud First
item.description: Our solutions are designed for the requirements of modern cloud based applications. Payments can be initiated directly from the client code and be confirmed for authenticity without any need to double check with our servers first.

item.title: Grow With Us
item.description: Don’t become irrelevant customer for a big company. As a smaller, fast growing company, every customer matters to us.

item.title: Get Started
item.description: Use the “Contact Us” tab in the lower right corner to get in direct contact with us and we help you get you started with your project.

item.title: Thank You
item.description: Thank you for reaching out. We will get back to you with our response.
